about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Over 60 years of expertise in the welding and cutting industry
about.historyText1: Laemthong Syndicate Co., Ltd. grew from the strong foundation of Yongkee Liap Heng Co., Ltd., a pioneer as the first oxygen gas producer in Thailand. Operations within the Laemthong group began in 1966, expanding into "Laemthong Syndicate Co., Ltd." in 1990 to become a full-scale leader in welding and metal cutting technology.
about.historyText2: With over 60 years of accumulated expertise, we are the trusted specialist as the sole agent and largest authorized distributor of HARRIS brand products in Asia. We also curate high-quality innovations and industrial products from 19+ leading global brands across 8+ countries, offering comprehensive solutions ranging from automatic metal cutting machines and welding electrodes to consumables for all types of engineering work.
about.historyText3: Our success is driven by the vision of Mr. Thong Laoboonmee, Chairman of the company, who made history as the first Thai national to be honored as a Life Member of the American Welding Society (AWS). With over 35 years of collaboration with the society, we are committed to delivering solutions that are precise, safe, and highly efficient — serving as a sustainable partner for Thai industry.
about.missionText: Decades of expertise and trusted global partnerships, delivering reliable products backed by knowledgeable service to power Thai industry forward.
about.reason1Desc: Largest HARRIS distributor in Asia with a 50+ year partnership and full product access.
about.reason2Desc: From Thailand's first oxygen gas plant to an AWS Life Member — unmatched industry knowledge.
about.reason3Desc: 19+ brands from 8+ countries covering machines, consumables, and parts at every price range.
about.reason4Desc: Engineers providing consultation, equipment selection, and dedicated after-sales service.
about.milestone1Desc: Mr. Thong Laoboonmee founded Laemthong Gas Products from Thailand's first oxygen gas producer.
about.milestone2Desc: Became the first authorized HARRIS (USA) distributor in Thailand.
about.milestone3Desc: Co-founded the first American Welding Society (AWS) chapter in Thailand.
about.milestone4Desc: Registered Laemthong Syndicate Co., Ltd. for welding and cutting technology.
about.milestone5Desc: 19+ global brands with laser welding and robotic solutions.

calibration.title: Equipment Calibration
calibration.shortDescription: Precision calibration services for welding equipment and measurement instruments ensuring accuracy and compliance.
calibration.description: Our calibration services provide traceable, accurate calibration for both welding equipment and measurement instruments. Proper calibration ensures your equipment operates within specified parameters, maintains product quality, and meets industry standards and regulatory requirements.

processSteps.title: Pre-Calibration Inspection

processSteps.title: Calibration Procedure
processSteps.description: Precision calibration performed using traceable reference standards.
